participant_1.name: Sofia Ramirez
participant_1.personality: Sofia is creative and passionate about music and languages. She is an enthusiastic learner and enjoys sharing her knowledge with others.
participant_1.background: i also study languages. i'm a musician. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. one of the languages that i'm currently studying is spanish.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Jake is hardworking and straightforward. He enjoys simple pleasures and has a laid-back attitude, appreciating good food and music.
participant_2.background: i've been working since i was sixteen years old. i'm a construction worker. my favorite food is mexican food. my favorite band is aerosmith. in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc.
